concepts.name: Text Extraction and Cleanup
concepts.description: Extracting raw text from input data by removing non-textual information and converting it into the required format.
concepts.golden_answer: Text extraction removes markup, metadata, and converts data into a usable format for NLP.

concepts.name: Character Encoding and Unicode Normalization
concepts.description: Ensuring text is correctly encoded and normalized for consistent processing.
concepts.golden_answer: Character encoding assigns numeric values to characters, and Unicode normalization standardizes representations of characters to avoid inconsistencies.

concepts.name: Spelling Correction
concepts.description: Fixing spelling errors in text using NLP techniques.
concepts.golden_answer: Spelling correction helps improve textual data quality by detecting and fixing errors through spell-checking algorithms.

concepts.name: Tokenization
concepts.description: Breaking down text into sentences and words for further analysis.
concepts.golden_answer: Tokenization splits text into sentences and words, enabling further NLP processing.

concepts.name: Stop Word Removal
concepts.description: Eliminating common words that do not carry significant meaning in NLP tasks.
concepts.golden_answer: Stop words are frequently used words (e.g., 'the', 'and', 'is') that are often removed to improve text analysis efficiency.

concepts.name: Lowercasing, Punctuation, and Digit Removal
concepts.description: Standardizing text by converting it to lowercase and removing unnecessary symbols.
concepts.golden_answer: Lowercasing and removing punctuation/digits help in making text uniform for NLP processing.

concepts.name: Stemming and Lemmatization
concepts.description: Reducing words to their base or root form.
concepts.golden_answer: Stemming removes suffixes to obtain the root word, while lemmatization maps words to their dictionary base form.

concepts.name: Text Normalization
concepts.description: Transforming text into a standard format, including expanding abbreviations and replacing emojis with words.
concepts.golden_answer: Normalization converts variations in text into a single standard form to enhance consistency in NLP tasks.

concepts.name: Part-of-Speech (POS) Tagging
concepts.description: Labeling words in a sentence with their grammatical roles (e.g., noun, verb, adjective).
concepts.golden_answer: POS tagging assigns grammatical categories to words, helping in syntactic and semantic analysis.

concepts.name: Named Entity Recognition (NER)
concepts.description: Identifying and classifying named entities such as persons, locations, and organizations in text.
concepts.golden_answer: NER extracts and categorizes proper nouns to facilitate structured information retrieval.

concepts.name: Parsing and Syntactic Analysis
concepts.description: Determining the grammatical structure of sentences based on a set of rules.
concepts.golden_answer: Parsing helps identify syntactic structures like noun phrases and verb phrases in sentences.

concepts.name: Coreference Resolution
concepts.description: Finding all expressions that refer to the same entity in a text.
concepts.golden_answer: Coreference resolution links different mentions of an entity, such as 'he' referring to 'John'.
